import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./header.css" import { faBed, faCalendar, faCar, faPerson, faPlane, faTaxi } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { DateRange } from "react-date-range"; import 'react-date-range/dist/styles.css'; // main css file import 'react-date-range/dist/theme/default.css'; // theme css file import { format } from "date-fns"; // to convert json input to readable format function Header({type}){ const [openDate,setOpenDate] = useState(false); const [date, setDate] = useState([ { startDate: new Date(), endDate: new Date(), key: 'selection' } ]); const [openOptions, setOpenOptions] = useState(false); const [options, setOptions] = useState({ adult: 1, children: 0, room: 1, }); const handleOption=(name,opeartion)=>{ setOptions({ ...options, [name]:opeartion==="i"?options[name]+1:options[name]-1 }) } return (
Stays
Flights
Car rentals
Attractions
Airport taxis
{type!=="list" &&

A lifetime of discounts? It's Genius.

Get rewarded for your travels – unlock instant savings of 10% or more with a free Lamabooking account

setOpenDate(!openDate)} className="headerSearchText">{`${format(date[0].startDate,"dd/MM/yyyy")} to ${format(date[0].endDate,"dd/MM/yyyy")}`} {openDate && setDate([item.selection])} moveRangeOnFirstSelection={false} ranges={date} className="date"/>}
{setOpenOptions(!openOptions)}} className="headerSearchText">2 adults 2 children 1 room
{ openOptions && (
Adult
{options.adult}
Children
{options.children}
Room
{options.room}
) }
}
) } export default Header;
